ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā was personally giving food to actors, dancers, acrobats, magicians, and musicians, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.5_0: “Venerable Thullanandā is a learned reciter; she’s confident and skilled at giving teachings.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.6_0: Give to her; work for her!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.8_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā act like this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā does this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.12_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.14_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun personally gives staple or non-staple food to a householder or a male wanderer or a female wanderer, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.8_0: any wanderer apart from Buddhist monks and novice monks.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.10_0: any female wanderer apart from Buddhist nuns, trainee nuns, and novice nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.12_0: apart from the five staple foods
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.13_0: and water and tooth cleaners, the rest is called “non-staple food”.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.15_0: there are five kinds of staple food: cooked grain, porridge, flour, fish, and meat.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.16_0: or gives it to someone else:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.17_0: if she gives by body or by what is connected to the body or by releasing, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.1.18_0: If she gives water or tooth cleaners, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.2_0: if she has someone else give it and does not give herself;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.3_0: if she gives by placing it near the person;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.4_0: if she gives ointments for external use;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc46:2.2.7_0: The sixth training rule is finished.
